name: Matt Chatfield
tweet: @RBoldan @hyena_project I did my Phd on this. Hyena’s build houses on the flood plains of lower rivers. The shitter is they swim upstream and pinch the material from beaver dams to make the houses. The houses inevitability end up in the sea. They’re reaction is where ‘crying like a hyena’ comes from.
